subject: Medicine
title: Nature vs. Nurture
description: A fast breakdown of Nature vs. Nurture for builders.

hook.text: Are you shaped more by your genes or your environment?

buildup.text: Twin studies compare identical twins raised together and apart.

discovery.text: Genes strongly influence traits like intelligence and weight.

twist.text: But environment shapes personality and mental health too.

climax.text: The answer is almost always both, in varying proportions.

punchline.text: Nature loads the gun; nurture pulls it.

quiz.question: What do twin studies help scientists understand?
options: The roles of genes vs. environment
